duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the buildout of next-generation data and machine learning platform
Collaborate with data scientists and ETL specialists to establish an innovative greenfield platform
Uphold engineering excellence through setting standards and integrating emerging technologies
Contribute to the improvement of the existing analytics platform and scalability and reliability of data transformation and storage
Optimize and design cloud computing solutions
Cultivate a culture of engineering excellence and contribute to the enhancement of software engineering practices in Python

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
